message.content:
cs.DC, cs.AR, cs.PF, cs.PL, cs.SE

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper discusses task-based programming models and runtime systems for parallel computing on manycore processors. 
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) is also likely as the paper evaluates the proposed runtime system on a heterogeneous hardware prototype platform. 
- cs.PF (Performance) is relevant as the paper evaluates the scalability and performance of the runtime system. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages) is relevant as the paper discusses the task-based programming model and its annotations. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) is less likely but still possible as the paper proposes design choices, policies, and mechanisms to enhance runtime system scalability.
